mapper.sql: ID , ORDER_TYPE, USER_ID, NICKNAME, REAL_NAME, HANDLE_PERSON, USER_TYPE, AUDIT_STATE, GMT_CREATE, GMT_MODIFIED, REASON
mapper.select: select count(*) from authentication_work_info
select count(*) from authentication_work_info where audit_state = #{auditState}
select count(*) from authentication_work_info where order_type = #{orderType}
select count(*) from authentication_work_info where nickname like "%"#{nickname}"%"
select count(*) from authentication_work_info where nickname like "%"#{nickname}"%" and audit_state=#{state}
select count(*) from authentication_work_info where real_name like "%"#{realName}"%"
select count(*) from authentication_work_info where real_name like "%"#{realName}"%" and audit_state=#{state}
select count(*) from authentication_work_info where user_type = #{userType}
select count(*) from authentication_work_info where user_id like #{userId}
select count(*) from authentication_work_info where handle_person like "%"#{handlePerson}"%"
select count(*) from authentication_work_info where handle_person like "%"#{handlePerson}"%" and audit_state=#{state}
select count(*) from authentication_work_info where auditor_id = #{aId} and handle_person like "%"#{handlePerson}"%" and audit_state in ("通过" ,"驳回")
select count(*) from authentication_work_info where auditor_id = #{aId} and real_name like "%"#{realName}"%" and audit_state in ("通过" ,"驳回")
select count(*) from authentication_work_info where auditor_id = #{aId} and nickname like "%"#{nickname}"%" and audit_state in ("通过" ,"驳回")
